title: New welfare tool to help improve the lives of elephants in human care

title_detail.value: New welfare tool to help improve the lives of elephants in human care

summary: Zoos and safari parks in the UK are using a special new tool to help them more successfully monitor the wellbeing of elephants in their care, thanks to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Zoos and safari parks in the UK are using a special new tool to help them more successfully monitor the wellbeing of elephants in their care, thanks to a new study.
